volunteer_experience.info:
Spent a wonderful time exploring my inherent interest in business & technology to the fullest by playing an active part in Business Club which is a biz-tech society under the IIT KGP Gymkhana for Analytics, Strategy and Finance enthusiasts.- Won quite a few Case Study Competitions.- Conducted knowledge meetings for juniors on Strategy Frameworks, and Data Analytics.- Organised corporate branding events, and managed our 1st international Indian Case Challenge event by…

          Spent a wonderful time exploring my inherent interest in business & technology to the fullest by playing an active part in Business Club which is a biz-tech society under the IIT KGP Gymkhana for Analytics, Strategy and Finance enthusiasts.- Won quite a few Case Study Competitions.- Conducted knowledge meetings for juniors on Strategy Frameworks, and Data Analytics.- Organised corporate branding events, and managed our 1st international Indian Case Challenge event by B-Club.- Made good connections.Skills: Case Studies · Data Analytics · Team Leadership · Organizing events · Presentation Skills

projects: [{"title":"Quality Assessment of Wikipedia Articles | Computer Science Dept. | IIT Kharagpur","start_date":"Nov 2018","end_date":"Mar 2019","description":"Received Letter of Recommendation from Professor Animesh Mukherjee for excellent research work- Performed extensive feature engineering by combining attributes from metadata & the content at each revision of Wikipedia page- Improved quality prediction over standard Wikimedia API (ORES) by implementing LSTMs to obtain an accuracy of around 65%"},{"title":"Neural Word Segmenter for Sanskrit | Computer Science Dept. | IIT Kharagpur","start_date":"Aug 2018","end_date":"Nov 2018","description":"Received Letter of Recommendation from Professor Pawan Goyal for contribution to the project.• Predicted the \"Unsandhied\" string from the \"Sandhied\" Sanskrit input as a structured prediction problem using a deep seq2seq model• Improved the segmentation task by using CopyNet, an encoder-decoder structure using a novel copying & prediction mechanism"},{"title":"OCR Module for Handwriting recognition","start_date":"May 2018","end_date":"Jun 2018","description":"-Achieved 98 percent accuracy for the classiﬁcation of handwritten alphabets and numerals by using deep learning techniques such as Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN) on EMNIST data set available on the internet."},{"title":"Path Planning and localization in 2D plane","start_date":"Jan 2018","end_date":"Feb 2018","description":"-Implemented path planning using RRT, RRT connect and Dijkstra on a 2-dimensional obstacle map along with using Kalman Filters for problem of localization"}]

honors_and_awards.title: Finalist | Data Analytics Competition | General Championship
honors_and_awards.description: General Championship is a nail biting competition amongst all the halls of residence (hostels) at IIT Kharagpur - Developed Data led models to help curb network congestion given cell tower statistics. - Recall - 80%; Classifiers used - SVM, Logistic, Random Forest.
